name: A Knight pretending to be too weak to clear the dungeon, ruthlessly stealing food in front of starving gobelins
name_original: A Knight pretending to be too weak to clear the dungeon, ruthlessly stealing food in front of starving gobelins
description:
A high level knight goes in a goblin's dungeon to steal their in front of them since he is a sadist.

Unreal Engine 4.27 C++ stealth game school project made in 4 weeks with a group of three.

Assets are from the internet for free.  https://quaternius.com/packs/ultimatedanimatedcharacter.html
